pages.title: Rooms
pages.text: Once in a dungeon, the player must find and enter rooms. These rooms will spawn large swaths of mobs that the player needs to defeat. Each type of mob has weaknesses and strengths (fire damage, magic resistance, etc). Once all the mobs are defeated, the player can loot the room. Rooms can be be looted without defeating all of the mobs, but since all mobs need to be defeated to start the boss fight, it is necessary to unalive them.
